meanings.definition: The act of recording or noting down in a minute or concise form.
meanings.sent1: Her minuting of the important details helped everyone understand the topic better.
meanings.sent2: The minuting of the key points made it easier to review the information later.
meanings.sent3: During the minuting process, she accidentally spilled coffee on the notes.
meanings.sent4: The minuting of facts was like capturing lightning in a bottle.
meanings.sent5: His minuting skills were so precise that nothing important was ever missed.

meanings.definition: A written record or summary of a meeting or discussion.

meanings.sent2: I need to check the minuting to see what decisions were made.
meanings.sent3: The minuting contained a doodle of a smiley face in the margin.
meanings.sent4: Her minuting was as clear as a crystal-clear lake on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The minuting captured the essence of the heated debate perfectly.
